name: Mine-ds
tagline: A 2D survival NDS game inspired by Minecraft.
body:
# About
A 2D survival NDS game inspired by Minecraft. Explore uncharted lands across multiple biomes as you survive in this 2D free-roam game. Features include:
- Inventory
- Crafting
- Zombies

# News
## The boiling water update!
![plain mine ds logo](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5875019/8511073/fb2709da-22cc-11e5-8865-9cffa3814161.png)

**Download:**

[Recommended Version (FAT)](https://github.com/Wolfgange3311999/Mine-DS/releases/download/v0.3.0/Recommended-Version-FAT.zip)

[Emulator Version (NitroFS + FAT)](https://github.com/Wolfgange3311999/Mine-DS/releases/download/v0.3.0/Emulator-Version-NitroFS-and-FAT.zip)

Version 0.3.0 brings in functional furnaces and water along with a variety of bug fixes. New features include:
 - Furnaces
 - Crafting tables are functional
 - Water with fluid system
 - Oceans
 - Food
 - Ability to disable regen

Video: https://youtu.be/la-VSG137DQ

Forum Post: http://gbatemp.net/threads/mine-ds.398892/

Screenshots:

![Furnaces](http://i.imgbox.com/hTDe8SG0.png)
![Water](http://i.imgbox.com/ycfy7QSr.png)


## New Release 0.2.0
![plain mine ds logo](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5875019/8511073/fb2709da-22cc-11e5-8865-9cffa3814161.png)

**Download:**

[Recommended Version (FAT)](https://github.com/Wolfgange3311999/Mine-DS/releases/download/v0.2.0/Recommended-Version-FAT.zip)

[Emulator Version (NitroFS + FAT)](https://github.com/Wolfgange3311999/Mine-DS/releases/download/v0.2.0/Emulator-Version-NitroFS-and-FAT.zip)

Mine DS version 0.2.0 is a feature-packed release incorporating most aspects of survival. Download links at the bottom. Features include:
- An inventory
- Crafting
- Full world saving/loading
- Texture packs
- Chests
- Sounds (Stereo)
- Streaming music
- Control Schemes
- Creative inventory
- Creative Flying
- A sleek new UI
- Dropped item
- Many bugfixes
- And much more!

Screenshots:

![house](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5875019/8511012/550b49a6-22c9-11e5-8cb1-37c4fa1c45ff.png)![mushroom](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5875019/8511013/550bafd6-22c9-11e5-8bdf-dacf3f1603b5.png)

![Cover Art][CA]

# How to get involved
- Look at the issues page to see some items that need to get added
- Setup the build environment
- Look at some of the code related to that aspect
- Message with any questions
- Submit a pull request
